creditline: Bequest of John R. Van Derlip in memory of Ethel Morrison Van Derlip
description: School of Troyes, 'Education of the Virgin', sculpture (polychromed stone), French XV c. cat. card dims H. 32-3/4" St. Anne holding a book from which the Virgin reads. Virgin represented as a little girl wearing cap and costume of the period.
title: The Education of the Virgin
